docs.snippet: Augmon is the great move the university’s men’s basketball team needs to reverse a decline that began 25 years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Augmon is the great move the university’s men’s basketball team needs to reverse a decline that began 25 years ago.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column says that Nevada is making big mistake by naming Todd Simon interim head coach of its men's basketball program, instead of associate head coach Stacey Augmon; notes that Augmon has had successful career in both professional and college basketball and is great mentor.

headline.main: For Stacey Augmon, U.N.L.V.’s ‘Mr. Rebel,’ the Time for Opportunity Has Come
headline.print_headline: For Augmon, U.N.L.V.’s ‘Mr. Rebel,’ the Time for Opportunity Has Come
